braid.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a narrow band of material formed by twisting threads together, used to decorate the edges of clothes
braid.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a jacket trimmed with red braid
braid.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a length of hair that has been separated into three parts and then woven together
braid.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Suzy always wears her hair in braids.
braid.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to weave or twist together three pieces of hair or cloth to form one length
